Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Mary:

Text.Language: Anok nim qa pie~bi/n para ouon niben ethijen pikahi eyricaji m~petaio Maria t~seri n~Iwakim.
Who am I, the weakest of all those upon the earth, to speak of your honor, O Mary, daughter of Joachim?
